snippet: LANCHNER--Carolyn, died peacefully at home on May 14th, surrounded by family members. They and her many devoted friends will miss her terribly. A distinguished curator of painting and sculpture at The Museum of Modern Art for over 20 years, she was a fiercely independent woman of sharp intellect, large mind, and a profoundly generous spirit. She died after a short, intense struggle with cancer. Memorial service details will follow. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LANCHNER--Carolyn, died peacefully at home on May 14th, surrounded by family members. They and her many devoted friends will miss her terribly. A distinguished curator of painting and sculpture at The Museum of Modern Art for over 20 years, she was a fiercely independent woman of sharp intellect, large mind, and a profoundly generous spirit. She died after a short, intense struggle with cancer. Memorial service details will follow. 1/3
